<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataNI extends data { const CODE = 'NI'; const PREFIX = 505; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:1800|[25-8]\d{3})\d{4}', ); const TYPES = array( '2\d{7}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:5(?:5[0-7]|[78]\d)|6(?:20|3[035]|4[045]|5[05]|77|8[1-9]|9[059])|(?:7[5-8]|8\d)\d)\d{5}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '1800\d{4}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
